attributes.action: Make it illegel to offer incentives for the use of credit cards. Make banks check the earnings of potential cutomers before offer a card. Only allow people to borrow up to half of there annual wage. Ban credit card junk mail and TV adverts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make the offer of freebie and money off on the use of a credit card illegel. make banks take more responabilty for who they give cards to and check the finacial situation of evercustomer.
